TEI.2.document_title: W. S. Parrott to Stephen F Austin, 10-23-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: W. S. Parrott in account with Austin, Mexico, October 23, 1833. United States exchange,
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1009

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*W. S. Parrott in account with Austin, Mexico, October 23, 1833. United States exchange,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="10-23-1833">Oct'r 23d 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*W. S. Parrott*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*, Dr.*/p*
*p*Draft favor *person_mentioned*Franco Pizarro Martinez*/person_mentioned*_____________________ $709.09*/p*
*p*do do *person_mentioned*E. G. Carvajal*/person_mentioned*__________________________________ 290.91*/p*
*p*$1,000 —*/p* *p*Sold at 10% premium—___________________________ 100.*/p*
*p*$1,100 —*/p*
*p*for confirmation, see File of *person_mentioned*McKinney */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*accts—*/p* *p*[Indorsed:]*person_mentioned* W. S. Parrott*/person_mentioned* Drafts sold him *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="10-23-1833">Oct'r 23d 1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
